statements: SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, age, income FROM users WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT user_id, username, age FROM users ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT username, income FROM users WHERE income > 50000;
SELECT MAX(income) AS max_income FROM users;
SELECT age, income, username FROM users WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY age DESC, income ASC
SELECT * FROM users WHERE clicked_on_ads = 1 AND income > 50000 ORDER BY age ASC
SELECT user_id, income FROM users WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY user_id ASC
SELECT age, income, username FROM users WHERE age > 30 AND clicked_on_ads = 0 ORDER BY income DESC
SELECT gender, age, income FROM users WHERE age < 40 ORDER BY gender ASC, age DESC
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT name, age FROM users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT MAX(age) FROM users;
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM users;
SELECT user_id, name, gender FROM users WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name DESC, location ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT user_id, name, age FROM users WHERE gender = 'Male' AND location LIKE '%City%' ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT name, gender, location FROM users WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 35 AND location NOT LIKE '%Street%' ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT user_id, name, location FROM users WHERE name ILIKE 'J%' OR location ILIKE 'A%' ORDER BY user_id DESC
SELECT * FROM users WHERE gender = 'Female' AND location = 'California' ORDER BY age ASC
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_name, age FROM users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT ad_name, ad_type, ad_cost FROM ads WHERE ad_cost < 1000;
SELECT user_name, age, gender FROM users ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT ad_name, ad_type, ad_cost FROM ads ORDER BY ad_cost DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY user_name ASC;
SELECT ad_name, ad_type FROM ads WHERE ad_cost > 1000 ORDER BY ad_name DESC;
SELECT user_name, age, gender FROM users WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 40 AND gender = 'Male';
SELECT user_name, ad_name FROM users JOIN click_data ON users.user_id = click_data.user_id JOIN ads ON click_data.ad_id = ads.ad_id;
SELECT user_name, ad_name, click_timestamp FROM users JOIN click_data ON users.user_id = click_data.user_id JOIN ads ON click_data.ad_id = ads.ad_id WHERE click_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT name, age FROM users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT ad_name, cost FROM ads WHERE clicks > 100 ORDER BY cost DESC;
SELECT user_id, name, age, gender FROM users WHERE gender = 'female';
SELECT location, income FROM demographics WHERE income >= 50000 ORDER BY income ASC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT ad_name, clicks FROM ads WHERE cost > 100 ORDER BY clicks ASC;

SELECT u.name, a.ad_name, d.location FROM users u JOIN ad_user_mapping m ON u.user_id = m.user_id JOIN ads a ON m.ad_id = a.ad_id JOIN demographics d ON u.user_id = d.user_id WHERE d.income > 50000 ORDER BY d.location ASC;
SELECT u.name, d.age_group FROM users u JOIN demographics d ON u.user_id = d.user_id WHERE u.gender = 'Female' AND d.income > 60000 ORDER BY u.name ASC, d.age_group DESC;
SELECT ad_name, COUNT(ad_id) AS total_clicks FROM ad_user_mapping GROUP BY ad_id HAVING total_clicks > 10 ORDER BY total_clicks DESC;
SELECT user_name, age, gender FROM users WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT email FROM users WHERE user_id=1;
SELECT ad_name, cost FROM ads WHERE clicks > 100 ORDER BY cost DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY end_date;
SELECT r.region_name, c.click_date, u.user_name FROM regions r JOIN clicks c ON r.region_id = c.region JOIN users u ON c.user_id = u.user_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY user_name DESC;
SELECT user_name, age, email FROM users WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY age;
SELECT ad_name, cost FROM ads WHERE clicks > 100 ORDER BY cost DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE end_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY campaign_name;
SELECT user_name, age, email FROM users JOIN clicks ON users.user_id = clicks.user_id WHERE region = 'USA' ORDER BY age;
